title: Enemy graves rushed phantom dancer. went 0-3
body:
I said "dat phantom dancer rush though"

His response was "thanks for ur low elo advice"

 Enjoy getting thrown in trashcans and losing all your games, kid. While i'll be winning mine and copying the logical probuilds.net

Then he said

"I'm a leader not a follower"

Seriously, this matchmaking is garbage. These kids have ZERO clue as to what they are doing.

I'm getting outta here fast.
